entry.title: Example elements for this theme
entry.summary: This article contains an example of all the elements in a page for this theme

This is bold and this is strong. This is italic and this is emphasized. This is superscript text and this is subscript text. This is code for i in 0..3 { println!(i); }. This is underlined, and finally this is a link.
